projects.title: Denormalized JSON Pipeline
projects.description: Pioneered a cutting-edge denormalized JSON pipeline, monitoring, and anomaly detection system of query in BigQuery, achieving a $400 USD monthly cost reduction.

projects.title: Data Discovery and Cataloging Solution
